gw.bc.account.entity

Interface ChargeCommission

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.ChargeCommissionStubI, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, IGosuObject, InCurrencySilo, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.InCurrencySiloStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, Retireable, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, TAccountOwner, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.TAccountOwnerStubI, Versionable

    public interface ChargeCommission
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.ChargeCommissionStubI
    ChargeCommission Maps PolicyCommissions to the Charges with which their commission is calculated.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MonetaryAmount getAmountToWriteOff() 
      MonetaryAmount getAmountWrittenOff()
      Returns the amount actually written off (transient field).
      MonetaryAmount getCommissionExpenseBalance()
      Gets the current balance of the "Commissions Expense" T-Account for the producer code for this policy.
      MonetaryAmount getCommissionExpenseNetOfAdjustment()
      Returns CommissionExpenseBalance + PositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance - NegativeCsmnAdjustmentBalance
      MonetaryAmount getCommissionPayableBalance() 
      com.guidewire.bc.util.Percentage getCommissionRate() 
      MonetaryAmount getCommissionReserveBalance() 
      CommissionsReserveWriteoffTxn[] getCommissionWriteoffs() 
      MonetaryAmount getNegativeCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
      Returns the balance of the NegativeCmsnAdjustment income t-account - represents the income received by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer downwards
      MonetaryAmount getPositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
      Returns the balance of the PositiveCmsnAdjustment expense t-account - represents the expense incurred by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer upwards
      java.lang.Boolean isSelectedForWriteoff() 
      void setAmountToWriteOff(MonetaryAmount amount)
      Sets the amount (transient field) to write off
      void setSelectedForWriteoff(java.lang.Boolean selectedForCommissionReserveWriteoff) 
      ChargeCommissionWriteoff writeOffCommissionReserve()
      Calls writeOffCommissionReserve(MonetaryAmount) with the commission reserve as a parameter.
      ChargeCommissionWriteoff writeOffCommissionReserve(MonetaryAmount amount)
      Calls out to ICommission.distributeCommissionWriteoffAcrossItemCommissions() plugin to determine how to allocate commission writeoffs to each invoice item, then executes the transactions.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommissionExpenseBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionExpenseBalance()
        Gets the current balance of the "Commissions Expense" T-Account for the producer code for this policy.

      • getCommissionRate

        com.guidewire.bc.util.Percentage getCommissionRate()
        Returns:
        the current balance of the "Commissions Expense" T-Account for the producer code for this policy.

      • getCommissionReserveBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionReserveBalance()

      • getCommissionPayableBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionPayableBalance()

      • getPositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance

        MonetaryAmount getPositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
        Returns the balance of the PositiveCmsnAdjustment expense t-account - represents the expense incurred by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer upwards

      • getNegativeCmsnAdjustmentBalance

        MonetaryAmount getNegativeCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
        Returns the balance of the NegativeCmsnAdjustment income t-account - represents the income received by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer downwards

      • getAmountToWriteOff

        MonetaryAmount getAmountToWriteOff()
        Returns:
        the amount (transient field) to write off

      • setAmountToWriteOff

        void setAmountToWriteOff(MonetaryAmount amount)
        Sets the amount (transient field) to write off

      • getAmountWrittenOff

        MonetaryAmount getAmountWrittenOff()
        Returns the amount actually written off (transient field). Used by the Commission Reduction Wizards

      • writeOffCommissionReserve

        ChargeCommissionWriteoff writeOffCommissionReserve()
        Calls writeOffCommissionReserve(MonetaryAmount) with the commission reserve as a parameter. Will still go out to the ICommission.distributeCommissionWriteoffAcrossItemCommissions() plugin to determine how to allocate the writeoff to each item.
        Returns:
        the ChargeCommissionWriteoff that was created by doing the commission writeoff

      • writeOffCommissionReserve

        ChargeCommissionWriteoff writeOffCommissionReserve(MonetaryAmount amount)
        Calls out to ICommission.distributeCommissionWriteoffAcrossItemCommissions() plugin to determine how to allocate commission writeoffs to each invoice item, then executes the transactions.
        Parameters:
        amount - Total amount of commission to write off across all items. Can be positive or negative.
        Returns:
        the ChargeCommissionWriteoff that was created by doing the commission writeoff

      • getCommissionWriteoffs

        CommissionsReserveWriteoffTxn[] getCommissionWriteoffs()
        Returns:
        all of the commission writeoff transactions that have been created for this ChargeCommission. The writeoffs are added to this ChargeCommission's bundle. Searches for all transactions that involve this ChargeCommission's POSITIVECOMMISSIONADJUSTMENT or NEGATIVECOMMISSIONADJUSTMENT t-accounts

      • isSelectedForWriteoff

        java.lang.Boolean isSelectedForWriteoff()
        Returns:
        true if selected for writeoff

      • setSelectedForWriteoff

        void setSelectedForWriteoff(java.lang.Boolean selectedForCommissionReserveWriteoff)
        Parameters:
        selectedForCommissionReserveWriteoff -

      • getCommissionExpenseNetOfAdjustment

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionExpenseNetOfAdjustment()
        Returns CommissionExpenseBalance + PositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance - NegativeCsmnAdjustmentBalance
